name: Localized PDF File
summary: Learn about .LPDF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LPDF files can be opened in Mac OS X with Apple Preview, the built-in previewer for PDF files.
NOTE: LPDF files are not PDF files. They are a specifically-formatted Mac OS X package that contains a PDF file as well as localization information.

description: Multilingual .PDF file, often named About Stacks.lpdf and About Downloads.lpdf, and found on Mac OS X systems; and saved in the Mac OS X package format and stores both the .PDF file as well as data that localizes the document for multiple languages.
